title: (1) Elation Design Spot 575B Moving Light
item_description:
(1) Elation Design Spot 575B Moving Light

(1) Elation Design Spot 575B Moving Light

  • Photos are representative of item.
  • The Design Spot 575B by Elation Professional is an intelligent moving head spot featuring 8 static dichroic color filters and 2 gobo wheels one with 6 rotating/indexing gobos and another with 7 static gobos with continuous, variable speed of each wheel scrolling in both directions. Additional features include rotating 3facet prism, iris, focus, dimmer and shutter. The unit is powered by Philips MSR 575/2 discharge lamp providing up to 1,000 hours estimated lamp life. Rated at IP20 this unit is designed for indoor applications only and can operate from a user selectable 90/120/208/240v via the internal power supply. Control data input is via 3 pin or 5 pin DMX data in and out connections.
